name: Turtle Evolution - Mutant Turtles Clicker Game
name_original: Turtle Evolution - Mutant Turtles Clicker Game
description:
Dude, it’s time to CHILL OUT! It’s time to leave all the RUSH behind you and enjoy the most relaxed version of the EVOLUTION series: the turtles are finally here! Get ready to embrace all the peace of mind of the wisest animals on earth (and sometimes in the undersea world too)!

In this AWESOME evolution game, you’ll meet all kinds of turtles! Make them evolve and discover new ones while you make money out of the very special TURTLE POOP!

HOW TO PLAY
• Drag and drop similar turtles to create new mysterious creatures

HIGHLIGHTS
• Different levels and many different turtle species to discover
• Watch out for the impostors that will get in your way!
• Put on funny HATS in your turtles and make them unique!
• Paint your turtles the color you want and create a very very special group of turtles!

No turtles were harmed in the making of this game, only developers. Come and check them out!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
